page.title: 02St.John's C.E.Primary School
page.content: {St.John's Church Of England Primary {School}was founded in 1864.In 1974 it was transferred to a new site near Lodmoor.Rebuilding was completed in 1982. It's catchment extends from Weymouth town centre northwards to the Overcombe district of Preston. The catchment area includes many hotels and guest houses as well as the local hospital and Weymouth College. St.John's has 350 pupils in 11 classes. Including the Head, there are 12 full time and 1 part time teachers. The support staff include a secretary, a caretaker, 2 ancillaries and 3 cleaners. Pupils begin schooling in their fifth year and leave,aged 11, transferring to a local comprehensive school.
